system.descriptionText: The Commander or Driver if there is no Commander of this vehicle can use their Command Skill to affect a number of squads or units equal to their Fellowship Bonus, combines with Fellowship-based Talents. Also gives +20 to all Command Tests.

description.value: The Commander or Driver if there is no Commander of this vehicle can use their Command Skill to affect a number of squads or units equal to their Fellowship Bonus, combines with Fellowship-based Talents. Also gives +20 to all Command Tests.
